body: hjlawton discusses the situation for media activists in Rwanda: "Kagame’s restriction of media outlets has been noted by Reporters Without Borders 2010 World Press Freedom Index, which lists Rwanda as one of the ten most repressive countries towards journalists."

title: Rwanda: Situation for media activists in Rwanda
